snippet: Saunders, the Minnesota Timberwolves’ president and coach, said that he was being treated for Hodgkin’s lymphoma, and that his doctors considered it “very treatable and curable.”
abstract: Minnesota Timberwolves president and coach Flip Saunders announces that he has Hodgkin’s lymphoma; will remain with team while undergoing treatment.
lead_paragraph: Saunders, the Minnesota Timberwolves’ president and coach, said that he was being treated for Hodgkin’s lymphoma, and that his doctors considered it “very treatable and curable.”
